headline: Resilient Structures and CenterPoint Energy Announce Strategic Long-Term Supply Agreement to Strengthen Greater Houston Grid
summary: HOUSTON, February 09, 2026--Resilient Structures (RS), a leading manufacturer of high-performance composite utility poles, today announced a long-term supply agreement with CenterPoint Energy (NYSE: CNP), an industry-leading Texas-based electric and natural gas utility serving more than seven million metered customers in six states. This strategic agreement strengthens the relationship between the two companies as they support CenterPoint’s Greater Houston Resiliency Initiative, a critical effor
